metadata.title: CVE-2024-38312 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: When browsing private tabs, some data related to location history orwebpage thumbnails could be persisted incorrectly within the sandboxed appbundle after app termination This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS <127.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
